person.persName: Elias Allen Stone (caldwell co., ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Lemuel A. Stone and Mariam J. Stone. Married to Fanny Stone. Father of Jefferson Stone and Edmund Stone. Laborer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Employed M. Moore as a farmhand in Princeton in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Princeton in 1860.
